scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && ruff check app/ --fix && ruff format app/ && mypy app/
scripts.lint:backend:check: cd backend && ruff check app/ && ruff format app/ --check && mypy app/
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
